#Text=Neither can I.  Aang says : " But I have to talk to Avatar Roku to find out what my vision means !

column1: #Text=I need to get to the Fire Temple before the sun sets on the solstice .
#Text=" Katara says : " We 're not letting you go into the Fire Nation , Aang .
#Text=" Sokka says : " At least , not without your friends .
#Text=" Senlin Village leader says : " It 's a long journey to the Crescent Island .
#Text=You 'll have to fly fast to have any chance of making it before sundown .
#Text=" Aang says : " Thank you for your - " Senlin Village leader says : " Go !
#Text=" Aang says : " Come on boy , we 've got a long way to go .
#Text=" Iroh says : " Sailing into Fire Nation waters ... Of all the foolish things you 've done in your sixteen years , Prince Zuko , this is the most foolish !
#Text=" Zuko says : " I have no choice , Uncle .
#Text=" Iroh says : " Have you completely forgotten that the Fire Lord banished you ?
#Text=" Zuko says : " I 'm chasing the Avatar !
#Text=My father will understand why I am returning home !
#Text=" Iroh says : " You give him too much credit .
#Text=My brother is not the understanding type !
#Text=" Iroh says : " Uh , really Prince Zuko , could n't you shoot them down with something more fragrant ?
#Text=" Katara says : " We have to get out of Zuko 's range , before he shoots another hot stinker at us !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Ca n't you make Appa go any faster ?
#Text=" Iroh says : " Technically you are still in Earth Kingdom waters .
#Text=Turn back now and they can not arrest you .
#Text=" Aang says : " If we fly north , we can go around the Fire Nation ships and avoid the blockade !
#Text=" Aang says : " This is exactly why I did n't want you to come !
#Text=" Katara says : " And that 's exactly why we 're here .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Let 's run this blockade !
#Text=" Zuko says : " He 's not turning around !
#Text=If the Fire Nation captures you , there is nothing I can do !
#Text=" Zhao says : " Shoot the bison down , captain .
#Text=" Captain says : " But there 's a Fire Navy ship out there , sir !
#Text=" Aang says : " Appa , are you okay ?
#Text=We need to stop and make repairs !
#Text=" Zuko says : " Do not stop this ship .
#Text=" Zhao says : " Ready ... " Zhao says : " Fire !
#Text=" Sokka says : " We got into the Fire Nation .
#Text=" Captain says : " Where do you think the Avatar is headed , sir ?
#Text=But I bet a certain banished prince will know .
